name: Freedom of the Press Status - Freedom House (2017)
title: Freedom of the Press Status - Freedom House (2017)
description: Shown is the status of the Freedom of Press. Freedom of the Press, an annual report on media independence around the world, provides numerical scores and country narratives evaluating the legal environment for the media, political pressures that influence reporting, and economic factors that affect access to news and information.

sources.name: Freedom House, Freedom of the Press Status (2017)
sources.dataPublisherSource: On-the-ground research, consultations with local contacts, and information from news articles, nongovernmental organizations, and governments.
sources.additionalInfo: Shown is the status of the Freedom of Press.
